name: Turkey Blast: Reloaded
description:
IPAD, IPHONE & IPOD UNIVERSAL! GAME CENTER! RETINA DISPLAY!

Turkey Blast: Reloaded is action-packed customizable arcade shooting fun for everyone!

- Game Center achievements and leaderboards
- 12 different turkeys
- 14 unlockable weapons
- 12 unique locations
- 5 different powerups
- 7 prize categories and more than 70 unlockable prizes
- Change weapons, targets, music, backgrounds and more using prizes you unlock
- Unlimited levels and bonus rounds
- Intuitive controls - tilt to aim, touch to fire

Every game session awards you coins that can be used to unlock a heap of in-game prizes including: weapons, turkeys, background music, scenes, obstacles, and even silly cartoons.

How do you like your turkey? Rare? Shish-kebab? Roasted? How about BBQ? With Turkey Blast: Reloaded the choice is yours! Each of the 14 unlockable weapons delivers a unique (and bizarre!) way of dishing out punishment to those turkeys!

Featuring Game Center achievements and leaderboards you'll be able to go head-to-head against your friends to see who is the Turkey Blast: Reloaded champion!

Other Ezone.com games you may like: Diversion, Crazy Snowboard, Scarecrow and Galactic Gunner.
